name: HSPC_ELECT_BKT_LST
description: This table stores a list of hospice election buckets. These may be election or de-election buckets.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HSPC_ELECT_BKT_ID
columns.description: Stores a list of hospice election buckets. These may be election or de-election buckets.
